segments.text: I notice the woman at the sink, focused on drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running full blast, basin full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading over, forming a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing under her feet quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbing the stool towards the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand inside the cookie jar now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl with arm extended, palm up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window open to the tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes piled on the counter to the side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Apron tied around her waist properly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between outside calm and inside activity is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's aware of the potential slips or falls.
segments.speaker: PAR
